overview: There was a 78-year-old man in Shanghai. He wanted to spend the rest of his life to climb 100 mountains. one day, when he was in the southeastern Tibet, he found that there was a Motuo Country in China with no highway leading to it. it was a scenic spot with Menbas living there. The children there should climb over the Himalayas to go to school....  The old man was shocked to learn this. He encountered all difficulties to go there to set up a primary school.  With Motuo as background,this film will you the real story...
title: Stirring Trip to Motuo
